ygData.subject: Re: Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yesterday evening at the frenzy camp (lower guk), an enchanter was able to keep things stunned virtually nonstop.  He didn t bother thralling stuff. I made
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Jan 2000 kim@... wrote:

> Stuns OTOH are more a means of damage control, rather than
> reduction.

Yesterday evening at the frenzy camp (lower guk), an enchanter was able to
keep things stunned virtually nonstop. He didn't bother thralling stuff.
I made it a point to poke fun at his neverending supply of scintillating
colors. -.-

(For those that don't know yet, it's the bard's job to keep morale up.
Sure you'll run across a humorous gnome now and then, but never let a bad
joke slide.)

Athren Notechaser, warming his dirge
Cazic-Thule
